It is my dream to collect and breed every mount in Arborea.

However, some very special ones are difficult to obtain on my own, so I am planning to purchasing them with passes from the Valkyon Federation.

I am collecting as many of them as possible since the number of pass required for each mount is very different.

If you get me ‘Special Mount Pass’,
which Valkyon Federation is issuing for a limited period of time,
I will give you the treasures I have collected so far in return!
